description: Phase 1 full migration: eliminate runtime_support_dependency files module-by-module while keeping existing 16-module quality and oracle parity gates green; defer out_of_scope files to phase 2.

userStories.title: Add module-scoped runtime-support tracking
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want module-level gap visibility so each migration batch can prove end-to-end closure per module.
acceptanceCriteria: Extend scripts/fortran/generate-gap-report.py to emit module-scoped support counts per runtime module
Add report output section with per-module runtime_support_dependency remaining count
Regenerated gap artifacts are deterministic across repeated runs
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Close POT runtime-support gap
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want POT to have no remaining runtime-support dependency files so POT runtime is self-contained in Rust scope.
acceptanceCriteria: POT module-scoped support count reaches zero in generated gap artifacts
POT parity regression remains green in crates/feff-core/tests/pot_parity.rs
Existing oracle gate still reports zero failed and mismatched fixtures
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Burn down shared multi-module support remainder
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want shared support code used across multiple runtime modules to be migrated so no runtime-support dependencies remain.
acceptanceCriteria: Shared support remainder across COMMON, KSPACE, MATH, TDLDA, FOVRG, EXCH, IOMODS, ERRORMODS, INPGEN, PAR, UTILITY, and RHORRP is migrated for runtime usage paths
Global runtime_support_dependency count reaches 0 in gap/fortran-to-rust-file-gap.csv
Existing oracle gate still reports zero failed and mismatched fixtures
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Complete phase-1 docs and toolchain cleanup
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want migration docs and automation to reflect phase-1 closure so status is auditable and reproducible.
acceptanceCriteria: Update tasks/migration-gap-analysis.md with phase-1 results and deferred phase-2 scope
Update README.md and docs/developer-workflows.md references to include the gap-report workflow
Add one reproducible command block for regenerating gap artifacts from a clean checkout
Typecheck passes
